TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of cell in the thyroid. Thyroid follicular cells make thyroid hormone.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "thyroid follicular cell"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "célula folicular de la tiroides"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de célula tiroidea. Las células foliculares de la tiroides producen la hormona tiroidea.
